front.title: The 'hrn:' URI Scheme for Hierarchical Resource Names

abstract.t: This document describes the 'hrn:' Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) scheme for hierarchical resource names. The 'hrn:' URI scheme belongs to the class of Hierarchical URI Schemes as defined in RFC 2396 'Uniform Resource Identifiers (URI): Generic Syntax'. This URI scheme is also a type of URN, as defined by RFC 2396, but is not a namespace of the 'urn:' URI scheme.
